definition: motive/intention/to be diligent or attentive/careful
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
to have an ulterior motive (idiom)
to ponder earnestly/to give a lot of thought to sth
to ponder earnestly/to give a lot of thought to sth
not paying attention to anything (idiom); to idle time away
to eat three square meals a day and do no work (idiom)/to be sated with food and remain idle
pinyin: bao3 shi2 zhong1 ri4 , wu2 suo3 yong4 xin1

sentences.english: Now she is a teacher of Diligent Education, teaching middle school students, mainly engaged in teaching English.
sentences.chinese: 現是用心教育中學部老師，主要從事英語的教學。

sentences.english: It's such a great film. The director took a lot of care while filming.
sentences.chinese: 電影很不錯，導演拍的時候很用心。

sentences.english: Leons birthday is coming soon, hao beauty attentively to prepare gifts for Leon.
sentences.chinese: 李昂生日快到了，郝麗人用心準備給李昂的禮物。

sentences.english: KOTORI :Although he don't speak much with his mouth, he always speaks with his heart.
sentences.chinese: 雖然他不太開口說話，可是他總是用心在說呢。

sentences.english: If you want your dreams to come true, don't sleep.
sentences.chinese: 要想夢成真，少睡多用心。

sentences.english: Breaking kids want to complete their dreams, broken children began learning the motive.
sentences.chinese: 破小孩想要完成自己的夢，破小孩就開始用心學習了。

sentences.english: The world is so big, but you only have to slow down and look carefully to see that there is splendor everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 世界這麼大，只要慢下腳步，用心去看，處處皆美景。

sentences.english: If you listen hard, you can hear what the neighbors are saying.
sentences.chinese: 如果你用心聽，你會聽到鄰居們在說些什麼。

sentences.english: I don't know, it just didn't seem like their heart was into it, so.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道，他們好像不用心，就這樣。

sentences.english: B : Uh-huh, I like the trees and plants and the landscaping of the campus.
sentences.chinese: 是呀，我覺得學校還蠻用心維護植物和校園景觀的。

sentences.english: Take a deep breath and feel the beauty of language with heart. Look, you can do it!
sentences.chinese: 深呼一口氣，用心感受語言的美妙，瞧，你也能行。

sentences.english: In other respects I think a lot of the material when decorating.
sentences.chinese: 其它的方面，我在裝修的時候選擇材料非常用心。

sentences.english: Woman loves to think of man with her heart, it is tormented more easily by heart.
sentences.chinese: 女人愛用心去想男人，最易受心的折磨。

sentences.english: But he doesn't think the presence was something his subconscious conjured.
sentences.chinese: 但他不認爲他的存在是一些別有用心的潛意識。

sentences.english: There is a sinister backdrop to traditional depictions of Judas.
sentences.chinese: 關於猶大的傳統描述有着用心險惡的背景。

sentences.english: Xianfeng : Serve people with heart and soul, we need these officials.
sentences.chinese: 用心和靈魂服務人民，我們需要這樣的警官。

definition: conscientious/earnest/serious/to take seriously/to take to heart
sincere/heartfelt/CL:片[pian4]
careful/attentive
to think through/to invest effort in thinking about/to consider thoroughly
with utmost care/fine/meticulous/detailed
to perfect sth that is already outstanding (idiom); constantly improving
to take care/to be mindful/(Internet slang) to be moved by sth/poignant/to have deep feelings for sb/to lose one's heart to sb
out of genuine friendship (idiom)/sincere feelings
to ponder earnestly/to give a lot of thought to sth
making an all-out effort (idiom); to try one's heart out/to do one's utmost
heart and soul/wholeheartedly
true/sincere/genuine
original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
details/particulars
to treasure/to value/to cherish
